###GENERATED by 'full_setup_vpn_server.sh'
######
# semanage port -a -t openvpn_port_t -p udp 44433 /// for allow udp-port
# semanage port -a -t openvpn_port_t -p tcp 44433 /// for allow tcp-port
###
# semanage port -d -t openvpn_port_t -p udp 44433 /// for deny udp-port
# semanage port -d -t openvpn_port_t -p tcp 44433 /// for deny tcp-port
###
# semanage fcontext -a -t openvpn_etc_rw_t /etc/openvpn/server/server-ipp.txt /// allow read/write operations with ipp-file (ifconfig-pool-persist)
# restorecon /etc/openvpn/server/server-ipp.txt /// Apply changes to file
###
# semanage port -l | grep openvpn_port_t /// for view list of openvpn ports allowed by selinux
